video_prompt: The video features a woman in a white shirt and glasses, speaking passionately in an indoor setting. She appears to be discussing a conflict involving Samsung and someone named D, expressing frustration and anger. The background is minimal, with a plain wall and a thermostat, focusing attention on her emotional delivery.

speech_prompt.speaker: a woman
speech_prompt.text: He said he wanted to pursue Samsung, so we had a big fight and started working from 4-2, and D couldn't produce a single one.
